title: Indian firms sign pacts at POWERGEN expo in US
description: Indian companies are exploring business and collaboration opportunities in the power generation sector at the POWERGEN International Expo in the US. Organized by the Indian Chamber of Commerce with support from the Ministry of Commerce and Industries, the expo has 18 participants from the power generation, distribution, and utilities sector
